oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Taboo search algorithm for continuous function optimization
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAJESH, J
JAYARAMAN, VK
KULKARNI, BD
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: taboo search
stochastic
global optimization
elite list
taboo list
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Taboo search framework provides a simple and effective procedure for solving global optimization problems involving continuous functions. This novel algorithm handles both constrained and unconstrained functions very well and can be successfully used for large-scale process optimization.
